main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported over Cincinnati, Ohio, with one sighting occurring on June 6, 1964.
interesting points: The sighting on June 6 lasted for about 10-15 seconds and was determined to be a balloon,The document references multiple sightings on September 3, 1954, in the same area,Several bright lights were reported to be moving at an estimated speed of 600-700 mph at an altitude of 10,000 feet,Witnesses described a large, saucer-shaped object glowing and hovering silently,The reports highlight inconsistencies in explanations, suggesting atmospheric disturbances may have contributed.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects including lights and a large saucer-shaped object
witness description: Three boys who reported a glowing object while they were sleeping in a field
